item.title: Ebro In The Morning - New Drake & 21 Savage + Happy Birthday Laura Stylez!
item.itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
item.itunes:summary:
Ebro, Rosenberg and Laura Stylez star in HOT97's flagship program Ebro in the Morning - this episode aired on 11/3/2022.

Ebro, Rosenberg, Laura Stylez and the crew are in the studio talking about the upcoming midterms, Laura's Birthday, and more of Kyrie's debacle. 

All that and more on Ebro In The Morning!

item.title: BONUS: Lurie Daniel Favors On Election 2022 + What To Tell People Who Don't Want To Vote
item.itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
item.itunes:summary:
Host of SiriusXM's Urban View Lurie Daniel Favors joins Ebro in the Morning to break down the different propositions voters face in Election 2022, the importance of voting in the midterm elections, and how to challenge those who lost confidence or decide they do not want to partake in the electorial process. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

item.title: BONUS: Kevin Liles On Takeoff, The Fight To Protecting Black Art + Ye
item.itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
item.itunes:summary:
Co-founder & CEO of 300 Entertainment Kevin Liles joins Ebro in the Morning for an important discussion on the fight to protect black art. He discusses the bill that passed The Decriminalizing Artistic Expression Act that passed in California which makes it illegal to use rap lyrics to prosecute a case, and how he would like to see this followed across the nation. Lyles also discusses the differences in how rap lyrics are looked at versus other genres. He also discusses Takeoff's tragic death and Ye's recent comments. 

Listen to The New MVMT Podcast with DJ Drewski -

iTunes - https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/the-new-mvmt-podcast/id1648512032

Spotify - https://open.spotify.com/show/5ZYhT11czj4sdp7idNQxIZ 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

item.title: BONUS: Ashanti Opens Up On Irv Gotti, Ja Rule, Dating, Ghana, Linsanity + New Book!
item.itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
item.itunes:summary:
Ashanti is on Ebro in the Morning today! She opens up about multiple topics such as Irv Gotti, her friendship with Ja Rule, not being included in the Murder Inc documentary, her dating life, favorite songs to perform, plans to travel to Ghana, having a mom as a manager throughout her career, and more! Her children's book 'My Name Is A Story' is available now. She is also featured on the Diddy remix of 'Gotta Move On' which also includes Yung Miami. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

item.title: BONUS: DaBaby On Megan Thee Stallion Controversy, Danileigh, Akademiks, Therapy + New Music
item.itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
item.itunes:summary:
DaBaby sits down with Ebro and Rosenberg and opens up on a variety of different topics and controversies that have kept him in the limelight for much of 2022. He opens up and gets candid on topics such as his lyrics including Megan Thee Stallion on 'Boogeyman', the situation between himself and Danileigh and her brother, allegations that he was being blackballed, performing at Summer Jam, reports he ony sold 500 tickets to a show, how the controversy has affected (or not affected) his business, changing his mindset, social media, therapy and more. 'Baby On Baby 2' is available now. He will be performing at Irving Plaza November 3. 

Listen to The New MVMT Podcast with DJ Drewski -

iTunes - https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/the-new-mvmt-podcast/id1648512032

Spotify - https://open.spotify.com/show/5ZYhT11czj4sdp7idNQxIZ 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

item.title: BONUS: Jalyn Hall On Playing Emmett Till, Acting + Importance Of Learning History While Young
item.itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
item.itunes:summary:
Actor Jalyn Hall sits down with Ebro in the Morning for a great conversation about playing the difficult role of 14-year-old Emmett Till in the film 'Till' which is scheduled to hit theaters Friday, October 28. He also discussed the importance of looking at Till as a human and not just a body that was brutally kidnapped and murdered due to racism.

The 15-year-old also goes into detail about his career and love for acting, his parents influence on him, and the importance of being able to learn about some of the most important parts of the history of the United States of America. 

Listen to The New MVMT Podcast with DJ Drewski - New Episodes with ATL Jacob, The Lobby Boyz, Yung Gravy, Rema, and more!

iTunes - https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/the-new-mvmt-podcast/id1648512032

Spotify - https://open.spotify.com/show/5ZYhT11czj4sdp7idNQxIZ 

Subscribe to "Captains & Majors" on iTunes, Spotify, and Amazon. 

iTunes: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/captains-majors-the-journey-to-the-hbcu-ny-football-classic/id1644231857

item.title: BONUS: LaLa Breaks Down What She Wants In A Partner, Rikers Island Mentorship, + Acting Sex Scenes
item.itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
item.itunes:summary:
LaLa comes through Ebro in the Morning to discuss her important Rikers Island Initiative where she mentors young inmates between the age of 18-21 as they work on their confidence, self-esteem, and what to expect when they get out of prison. Lil' Baby was the latest person to join her to talk to inmates as LaLa explains. Ebro also grills her about what she is looking for in her next relationship, where she breaks down whether she would get married again, going through divorce, dating a younger man, what kind of swag she's looking for, and acting sex scenes for shows such as 'Power' and 'BMF'. 

Listen to The New MVMT Podcast with DJ Drewski -

item.title: BONUS: Jeezy On Gucci Mane Verzuz, Unaired Ye Shop Episode, Freddie Gibbs, New Project + Super Bowl?
item.itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
item.itunes:summary:
Jeezy sits down with Ebro in the Morning to discuss a variety of topics spanning the last 20 years of his career. He discusses his growth personally and in business, as he continues his hustle in different ways including his new partnership with Naud Cognac and Defiance Fuel. The Atlanta rapper also talks about appearing on an episode of The Shop that included Ye which has decided to be unaired. Other topics during the conversation include fatherhood, his legacy, the Verzuz with Gucci Mane, a recent run-in with Freddie Gibbs, his legacy, BMF, and more! Will he show up to the Super Bowl alongside Rihanna next year? He's definitely open to it. His latest project 'Snofall' is scheduled to be released Oct. 21

Listen to The New MVMT Podcast -

iTunes - https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/the-new-mvmt-podcast/id1648512032

Spotify - https://open.spotify.com/show/5ZYhT11czj4sdp7idNQxIZ 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

item.title: BONUS: 50 Cent On Kanye West, Eminem's Legacy, Nicki Minaj, New Music + 'Surviving El Chapo'
item.itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
item.itunes:summary:
50 Cent joined Ebro in the Morning for an enlightening conversation about many of his business dealings and projects including Sire Spirits being exclusive with several sports teams including Sacramento Kings, Houston Texans, Astros, and Rockets through the G-Unit foundation. He also discussed living in Los Angeles, some of the latest news surrounding his television shows and podcasts.

He also discussed his success in mixtapes, Nicki Minaj & Latto's back and forth, Eminem's legacy, Kanye West's latest actions, past beef with Fat Joe & Murder Inc's, and more! 'Surviving El Chapo: The Twins Who Brought Down a Drug Lord' is set to released tomorrow. 

Subscribe to "Captains & Majors" on iTunes, Spotify, and Amazon.

item.itunes:summary:
Freddie Gibbs (without a shirt) joins Ebro in the Morning from the comfort of his own bed to have a good conversation about social media, rap beefs, issues between himself and Jim Jones and Benny the Butcher, his love for legends such as Bone Thugs-N-Harmony and Scarface, and more! His latest project '$oul $old $eparately' is available now! 

Subscribe to "Captains & Majors" on iTunes, Spotify, and Amazon. 

Amazon: https://music.amazon.com/podcasts/7ce3df43-baea-467a-9c40-065a397f4b4d/captains-majors---the-journey-to-the-hbcu-ny-football-classic 

Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/show/6ZuO0qvyWoeo3KxNutMxg6?si=50e84457edf147fa 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

item.title: BONUS: Kenya Barris On 'Blackish' Success, Writing TV, 'Wizard of Oz' Remake & 'Entergalactic'
item.itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
item.itunes:summary:
Creator of shows such as 'Black-ish', 'Grown-Ish', 'America's Top Model' and 'BlackAF' Kenya Barris sits down with Ebro in the morning to discuss the success of some of these shows, the influence and business behind them, his love for music, and more! He also discusses upcoming projects such as a remake of the 1939 classic 'The Wizard Of Oz' and 'Entergalactic' which is available to stream on Netflix now! 

Subscribe to "Captains & Majors" on iTunes, Spotify, and Amazon.

item.itunes:summary:

item.title: BONUS EPISODE: Sheron Edwards Joins Jason Flom To Discuss His Excessive Sentence, Judges + Case
item.itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
item.itunes:summary:
Podcaster and activist Jason Flom sits down with Ebro in the Morning to help share the story of Sheron Edwards. Edwards was arrested in 1999 on robbery charges in Mississippi as a college student after stealing a man's car after a fight with his girlfriend. He was sentenced to 20 years in federal prison and then another 20 years in state prison for the same crime to be served consecutively.

He shares his story, and they discuss the actions which resulted in this sentence, the judge attached to this case, steps he has taken over the years, and how this compares with the rest of the world. Edwards currently has a petition on https://www.change.org/p/16th-circuit-court-of-oktibehha-county-save-sheron-edwards-from-serving-state-and-federal-terms-for-the-same-exact-crime

SIGN UP FOR OROCASH HERE: https://www.oro.fund/

Subscribe to "Captains & Majors" on iTunes, Spotify, and Amazon. 

iTunes: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/captains-majors-the-journey-to-the-hbcu-ny-football-classic/id1644231857 

Amazon: https://music.amazon.com/podcasts/7ce3df43-baea-467a-9c40-065a397f4b4d/captains-majors---the-journey-to-the-hbcu-ny-football-classic 

Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/show/6ZuO0qvyWoeo3KxNutMxg6?si=50e84457edf147fa

item.itunes:summary:
Soca artist Kes stopped by Ebro in the Morning just before hopping on the On Da Reggae & Soca Tip stage September 2 to discuss a variety of topics including making Soca music more mainstream, life during the middle of the pandemic, Trinidad's history, and the inspiration behind his latest single 'Liki Tiki'! On Da Reggae & Soca Tip goes down 9/2 from the Coney Island Amphitheater! Tickets on sale now at Ticketmaster. #Kes #HOT97 #EbrointheMorning

item.title: BONUS EPISODE: Luenell Announces Netflix Special Produced By Dave Chappelle + Talks Only Fans, Flashing Inmates
item.itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
item.itunes:summary:
Luenell joined Ebro in the Morning and had a great and hilarious conversation with the team as she discusses her upcoming performance at Caroline's! She discusses her longstanding relationship with fellow comedian Earthquake, touring with Katt Williams, her origin story, reasons she's creating an Only Fans page, being recognized for her role in 'Borat', and even gave some background into why she decided to flash some inmates on Instagram Live.

The comedian also announced a Netflix special being produced by Dave Chappelle that is set to be released next year. Luenell will be performing at Caroline's from 9/1-9/4. For more informations visit https://www.carolines.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

item.title: BONUS EPISODE: Ben Crump On Breonna Taylor Update, Menthol Ban, US DOJ + Are Things Changing?
item.itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
item.itunes:summary:
Attorney Ben Crump joins Ebro in the Morning for an important conversation on how things are changing in America, and give updates on cases such as Breonna Taylor in which an officers involved with her killing were charged. 

He also discusses how the United States Department of Justice has handled cases such as George Floyd,  Ahmaud Arbery, and other Civil Rights cases, how the Menthol ban will effect communities of color, and answers if he has seen improvement in how black and brown people have been treated by law enforcement. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

item.title: BONUS EPISODE: White House Press Secretary Karine Jean-Pierre Talks Roe V. Wade, COVID, and the Recession
item.itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
item.itunes:summary:
White House Press Secretary Karine Jean-Pierre joined Ebro in the Morning to discuss updates on some of the biggest issues affecting the American people including whether the United States is in a recession and her assessment of the economy, codifying Roe V. Wade, President Joe Biden's COVID-19 status, and more. She also discussed what it means as a Haitian-American getting the job, her families expectations of her, and some of the things she has to endure in the role. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

item.title: BONUS EPISODE: Danny Garcia Pre-Fight Interview
item.itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
item.itunes:summary:
Preparing for his upcoming fight against Jose Benavidez, Philadelphia native Danny Garcia steps up to Ebro in the Morning for a great conversation discussing his thoughts on being the only Puerto Rican from Philadelphia to rise in the ranks, moving up in weight at 154 pounds, showing emotion before a fight, things he's missed out throughout the years, being a young boxer, and much more!

He also discussed his thoughts on Jake Paul entering the Boxing world, and whether he things he has a future in the sport. Garcia also addresses the rumors of a Floyd Mayweather vs Conor McGregor sequel, and more!

His bout against Benavidez goes down Saturday, July 30 live from the Barclays Center and on Showtime Championship Boxing. #EbrointheMorning #HOT97 #DannyGarcia

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

item.title: Ebro In The Morning - If No One Cares? Ebro Does + Bianca Belair and Valerie Loureda Join The Show

item.itunes:summary:
Ebro, Rosenberg and Laura Stylez star in HOT97's flagship program Ebro in the Morning - this episode aired on 7/22/2022.
Ebro, Rosenberg, Laura Stylez and the crew are in the studio discussing the heat wave sweeping the nation, Bianca Belair joins the program, and if no else care, Ebro does!

item.title: BONUS EPISODE: Rowdy Rebel Talks New Album "Rebel Vs. Rowdy"
item.itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
item.itunes:summary:
Rowdy Rebel slid through Ebro in the Morning exciting about his upcoming album 'Rebel vs Rowdy' and showing the world his music.
He describes during the conversation that the title speaks on his split personality. He discusses his relationship with Bobby Shmurda (who is not on this album, but featured in a joint project they are working on), previously being in a group with Fivio Foreign, Pop Smoke, first thing he did when he came home from jail, how he got caught up in a gang, artists that uplifted him and his vision for his career. ''Rebel vs Rowdy' is out now!

item.title: BONUS EPISODE: Damon Wayans On Stand-Up & Upcoming New York Shows
item.itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
item.itunes:summary:
Legendary comedian Damon Wayans joined Ebro in the Morning for an insightful and entertaining conversation about his career, being recognized more about his stand up, his thoughts on young comedians and much more!
He also discusses his son, Damon Wayans JR. and the untapped potential he possesses that hasn't been shown to the world yet. Other topics include his thoughts on Dave Chappelle, the Verzuz challenge that went viral, Will Smith and the slap heard around the world, Paul Mooney, the legacy of 'In Living Color', characters he would like to portray and more!
He will be performing at Caroline's On Broadway Thursday, June 14! For more information visit: https://www.carolines.com/
See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

item.title: BONUS: Rap Music On Trial Bill w/ Senator Jamaal Bailey, Assemblywoman Catalina Cruz, and CEO Kevin Liles
item.itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
item.itunes:summary:
Subscribe to "Summer Jam: Through The Years" - hosted by Laura Stylez!
Amazon: https://music.amazon.com/podcasts/6dfef9f3-4ff5-4d05-a857-6689c99aa999/summer-jam-through-the-years
Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/show/7MP62llakMJSXkJzwFclgq
Apple: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/summer-jam-through-the-years/id1627066431
Ebro in the Morning sits down with Senator Jamaal Bailey , Assemblywoman Catalina Cruz, and CEO/Founder of 300 Entertainment Kevin Liles to discuss the importance of New York Senate Bill S7527 which would limit a prosecutor's use of song lyrics and other forms of creative expression to be used as evidence in court. He also discusses the Protect Black Art campaign in which HOT 97, 300 Entertainment and others will be providing petitions in support of this bill, Summer Jam and much more!
SUMMER JAM TICKETS: HOT 97 Summer Jam Tickets, 2022 Concert Tour Dates | Ticketmaster
See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

item.title: BONUS EPISODE: Amanda Seales On Name Change, Cancel Culture, + Stand Up Shows
item.itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
item.itunes:summary:
Subscribe to "Summer Jam: Through The Years" - hosted by Laura Stylez!
Amazon: https://music.amazon.com/podcasts/6dfef9f3-4ff5-4d05-a857-6689c99aa999/summer-jam-through-the-years
Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/show/7MP62llakMJSXkJzwFclgq
Apple: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/summer-jam-through-the-years/id1627066431
Comedian & actress Amanda Seales sits down with Ebro in the Morning to discuss a variety of topics including her decision to change her name, leaving New York City, her journey in hip hop in the beginning of her career, why she got into comedy and more. She also discusses how she has grown in comedy, her thoughts on cancel culture, and how a cab ride helped shape her stand-up routine. You can see her on The Black Outside Again Tour starting June 24. Check Ticketmaster for details!
SUMMER JAM TICKETS: HOT 97 Summer Jam Tickets, 2022 Concert Tour Dates | Ticketmaster

item.title: TEASER - Summer Jam: Through The Years - Ebro, Laura, & Rosenberg Talk 2012
item.itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
item.itunes:summary:
In 2012 - HOT 97's signature concert Summer Jam was turned on it's head when HOT 97 talent Peter Rosenberg criticized "Starships" by Nicki Minaj, and Young Money pulled out of the show. Hear about the year artists like A$AP Rocky and Kendrick Lamar made names for themselves on the festival stage, and Maino & DJ Drewski opened up the main stage - learn the stories behind those moments & so much more.
Subscribe to "Summer Jam: Through The Years" - hosted by Laura Stylez!
Amazon: https://music.amazon.com/podcasts/6dfef9f3-4ff5-4d05-a857-6689c99aa999/summer-jam-through-the-years
Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/show/7MP62llakMJSXkJzwFclgq
Apple: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/summer-jam-through-the-years/id1627066431
On this episode of "Summer Jam: Through The Years" HOT 97 personality Laura Stylez from Ebro In The Morning narrates a series of interviews with the people and artists who were at Summer Jam 2012 conducted by HOT 97 in-house reporter Jason N. Peters.
Guests on this episode include: Summer Jam Producer Carl Freed, hip-hop historian Ralph McDaniels of Video Music Box, DJ Juanyto, DJ Drewski, Maino, Peter Rosenberg and Ebro Darden!
See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

item.title: BONUS EPISODE: Caleb McLaughlin of Stranger Things + Chad Hugo of The Neptunes
item.itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
item.itunes:summary:
Ebro in the morning sits down with Caleb McLaughlin to discuss his journey so far, working on Stranger Things, his struggle, what he is working on, and more! His new single 'Soul Travel' is available now!
Rosenberg & Laura Stylez sits down with Ebro in the Morning for a very interesting and rare conversation with Chad Hugo of The Neptunes. They briefly discuss his journey with the Neptunes, how he got started, some of his talent using different instruments, hearing 'Superthug' play on the radio for the first time, and more! The Neptunes will officially be inducted into the Songwriters Hall Of Fame in June!

item.title: BONUS EPISODE: Muggsy Bogues Joins Talks NBA, New Book, & Much More
item.itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
item.itunes:summary:
NBA legend Muggsy Bogues sat down with Ebro in the Morning to go down memory lane and share some stories from his 14 years playing with the Charlotte Hornets, Golden State Warriors, and Toronto Raptors.
He discussed being one of the shortest players in the league's history and overcoming some of his obstacles, playing against Michael Jordan, calls Steph Curry the best shooter ever, his thoughts on today's NBA, Manute Bol, and more! The book 'Muggsy: My Life from a Kid in the Projects to the Godfather of Small Ball' is available now!

item.title: BONUS EPISODE: Chigozie Onyema Running for West Ward City Council + World Burgos On "Checklist"
item.itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
item.itunes:summary:
Ebro get the inside scope of the inspiration behind the play Checklist from the Director and Stars of the play, World Burgos and Khalid Burgos. He also finds out what really happens during rehearsals.
Chigozie Onyema is running for West Ward City Council in Newark, New Jersey and he sits down with the Ebro in the Morning team to share how he plans to make a difference if elected. Some of the issues he discussed is housing, engaging with the community, and more! Elections in Newark are being held May 10!

item.title: BONUS EPISODE: Rapsody On Being Authentic + ESPN Partnership
item.itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
item.itunes:summary:
Rapsody stepped up to Ebro in the Morning to discuss the 50th anniversary of Title IX which protects against discrimination based on sex and her partnership with ESPN. She also discussed being the face of an alternative voice of women in hip hop, the reaction to the leaked Supreme Court draft reversing Roe vs Wade, her upcoming music, remembering Mac Miller and Nipsey Hussle, and more!

item.title: BONUS EPISODE: Sean Paul Joins Ebro In The Morning
item.itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
item.itunes:summary:
Sean Paul sat down with Ebro in the Morning to speak about his new music, and much more! The Jamaican native discussed some of his favorite tracks, and how the top 5 tracks he would play in a diverse crowd. He also breaks down the difference between artists today, and how they were when he was a new artist in the game.
Other topics include working with Sia, how COVID-19 impacted him and his family, and the amount of features on his most recent album 'Live N Livin' 'Scorcha' is scheduled to be released May 27, 2022.

item.title: Bonus Episode - Coodie & Chike On 'Jeen-Yuhs' + Sharing Kanye West Stories
item.itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
item.itunes:summary:
Coodie & Chike joins Ebro in the Morning to discuss details behind the 3-part Netflix Documentary showcasing Kanye West's rise to fame using rare footage from his life named 'Jeen-Yuhs'. They also discuss their relationship with Donda West, share stories about Kanye West, footage that was not used in the documentary including a Jay-Z freestyle, what it took to get Ye on board with the documentary, their relationship with the artist, and much more. 'Jeen-Yuhs' is available on Netflix now.

item.title: BONUS EPISODE - RZA & DJ Scratch Talk New Album + Bronx Borough President Vanessa L. Gibson
item.itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
item.itunes:summary:
RZA & DJ Scratch sat down with Ebro in the Morning to discuss their brand new project 'Saturday Afternoon Kung Fu Theater' which is out now! RZA discusses his thoughts on Kanye West, any updates of 'Once Upon A Time In Shaolin', thoughts on 'Wu-Tang: An American Saga' and more while Scratch talks about the concept of the project, why he decided to create it, and a part in the Hulu show.
Bronx Borough President Vanessa L. Gibson sits down with Ebro in the Morning to address the delay of money from the Mayor's Fund getting to victims of January's fire at a Bronx apartment building that displaced many families and tragically left 17 killed. She discusses the plans for families to stay in hotels until April, why the delay in finding them apartments, vouchers for rent, what's being provided, and more.
See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

Gibson sits down with Ebro in the Morning to address the delay of money from the Mayor's Fund getting to victims of January's fire at a Bronx apartment building that displaced many families and tragically left 17 killed. She discusses the plans for families to stay in hotels until April, why the delay in finding them apartments, vouchers for rent, what's being provided, and more.

item.itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
item.itunes:summary:

His book Hip Hop at the End of the World: The Photography of Brother Ernie is available now.

You can watch her live on the Road To Wrestlemania Saturday, March 5 at Madison Square Garden on Ticketmaster!

item.title: Bonus Episode: Sherri Warren on the 'Uprooted' Docuseries + Death of Keith Warren
item.itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
item.itunes:summary:
In 1986, 19-Year Old Keith Warren was found hanging from a tree in Silver Spring, Maryland which is a predominately white suburb. His death was ruled a suicide. Since that day his sister Sherri Warren has been fighting to bring justice to his death as she believes it was not properly investigated and should be reclassified as either undetermined or a homicide.
She sits down with Ebro in the Morning to discuss the events that will be covered in a 3-part docuseries 'Uprooted' to be released on Discovery +.
See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

item.title: Ebro In The Morning - Special Guest: Cordae
item.itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
item.itunes:summary:
Rapper Cordae sits down with Ebro in the Morning to have an open discussion on his various relationships with the likes of Eminem, Dr. Dre, Lil Wayne, Kanye West, Stevie Wonder and more.
he also discusses personal topics including his brother Simba who is currently incarcerated, yet featured on his album, and his discussions with Kim Kardashian, the rap scene in the DMV area, being in the tennis world due to his relationship with Naomi Osaka, his weight loss, and studying to be noted as one of the greats one day. His album 'From a Birds Eye View' is available now!

item.title: Ebro In The Morning - Ron Killings (R-Truth) On John Cena Rumors, Meeting 2Pac + New Album
item.itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
item.itunes:summary:
WWE star R-Truth aka Ron Killings sits down with Ebro in the Morning to discuss his career journey through the years from music to being one of the most respect stars in WWE. He detailed his relationship with John Cena including how rumors of a fight against the superstar started, as well as working with Roman Reigns, The Rock, and Vince McMahon.
He also discussed why he decided to push music, meeting 2Pac Shakur for the first time, and the inspiration behind his new music. His new single ""Out The Window"" is out Friday, 12/3! His new EP 'Legacy' is set to be released Dec. 10! #EbrointheMorning#HOT97#RTruth
See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
